Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the production of a film?
Options:
A. a) Principal photography for the film started in late-February 2018.
B. b) The film is the final product created through the production process.
C. c) Principal photography is an essential phase in the film production.
D. d) Production involves only the filming of scenes.
Correct Answer: a) Principal photography for the film started in late-February 2018., b) The film is the final product created through the production process., c) Principal photography is an essential phase in the film production.
